footer.desc: Balazs Bencs is a web/application developer at IBM, prefering the linux based operating systems. He loves the open source technologies, Cloud technologies and Artificial Intelligence. He likes to discover, learn and share new technologies.

tiles.title: Development
tiles.text: Application / portal development using the following technologies: node, Angular, CSS animations, Canvas, PHP, JavaScript, HTML5-6.

tiles.title: E-learning
tiles.text: Professional e-learning contents supporting the SCORM and the WCAG standards, that can be used in frameworks or as stand alone contents as well.

tiles.title: Frameworks
tiles.text: Well-proven, popular frameworks: Drupal, Moodle, Wordpress installation, design, plugin and feature development. Optimalisation, or upgrading.

tiles.title: Agile
tiles.text: Working in an agile view, organise or coach this way of working. On the other hand, I can teach any of the mentioned technologies in a professional level.

tiles.title: Data handling
tiles.text: Organise manipulate or create your data in a relational or non relational database like SQL or MongoDB. Develop the structure of the database or the data models. Documentation with the UML standard.

tiles.title: Cloud
tiles.text: Develop Cloud based applications like chatbots, helper robots or virtual workmates. I prefer the IBM cloud, Watson technologie, Google Cloud and Nore-Red for these works.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.slogan: View the story of my career.

steps.title: First steps
steps.text: At the biginning, I create game hacks, trainers, easy installers just for myself. I developed some webpages just for fun, but these were very succesfull, so because of this I got some order.

steps.title: The official learning
steps.text: I went to the University of Dunaújváros, and got the Network engineer degree. After that they asked me to stay in the scool to work.

steps.title: Work like a pro
steps.text: I worked at DUE and OneTech Kft at the same time. I developed portals, applications and learning materials to companies like Máv-Start, Gysev, Raiffeisen bank, Evosoft, Nébih. Tooke part in countrywide elearning projects with the school.

steps.title: The Big Blue
steps.text: I started to work at IBM ISSC Hungary as a web developer. I learned the agile view and design thinking practices to make my work more affective. Now, I work with the most modern technologies in wordwide projects and I develop apps in a very high level in node and angular.
